x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts.name: Generic Function inside Script Include

sys_update_version.name: x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_b517a4a3072739105295f19d7c1ed0ab
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts"><x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Generic Function inside Script Include</name><number>SCRIPT0001016</number><script><![CDATA[// Write a script include with the name getInstanceData within that there should be a function getData with Input Parameters
// TableName a string
// Fields a string (comma seperated field names)
// sysID a string
//This function should return a JSON string with the key as fields (that passed as one of the input parameter and value of that field)


//Sample Input 1

// sys_user
// title,email,user_name,manager
// 6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441
//Sample Output 1
/* 
 {"title":"System 
 Administrator","email":"admin@example.com
 ","user_name":"admin","manager":"611c188a070131105295f19d7c1ed083"}
*/

//Sample Input 2
// incident
// short_description,description,state,category,number
// 22385d10076331d05295f19d7c1ed00f

//Sample Output 2
/* 
{"short_description":"Issue for 48c9eedcc0a8018b3fca079c261987d6","description":"","state":"2","category":"inquiry","number":"INC0010045"}
*/


/*
//for background script
function getData(t,f,s)
{
var tbl=t;
var sysid=s;
var fields=f.split(",");
var xt=new GlideRecord(tbl);
xt.get(sysid);
var outObj={};
for(var i=0;i<fields.length;i++)
outObj[fields[i]]=xt[fields[i]]+"";
return JSON.stringify(outObj);
}

gs.info(getData('incident','short_description,description,state,category,number','22385d10076331d05295f19d7c1ed00f'))
gs.info(getData('sys_user','title,email,user_name,manager','6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441'))



var api=new getInstanceData();
gs.info(api.getData('incident','short_description,description,state,category,number','22385d10076331d05295f19d7c1ed00f'))
gs.info(api.getData('sys_user','title,email,user_name,manager','6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441'))
*/]]></script><sys_class_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-11 07:45:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>b517a4a3072739105295f19d7c1ed0ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generic Function inside Script Include</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Technical Repo" source="x_207260_technic_0">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Repo">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_b517a4a3072739105295f19d7c1ed0ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-11 07:45:48</sys_updated_on></x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts></record_update>
